“The world is stuck in a zero-sum approach to vaccine access, but it doesn’t have to be this way.” – @DimitriEynikel 

MSF urges the @EUCouncil to adopt a global approach to address #COVID19 #vaccine scarcity, starting with these two steps👉 https://t.co/LH3n24RbCS #EUCO https://t.co/JMNSvTLpUk
